wikipedia_page.main: Major General William Havelock Chaplin Ramsden,  (3 October 1888 – 16 December 1969) was a senior British Army officer, who is most notable for commanding the 50th (Northumbrian) Infantry Division during the Second World War.

link_mentions.page: Structure of the British Army in 1939
response: * Headquarters, West Lancashire Area, Preston under Brigadier William Havelock Ramsden
